entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Rain showers beginning near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries and rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 3 cm inland. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
